short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your twitter timeline into your personal shop and let people print your tweets on t-shirts, mugs, etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our goal is to allow all Twitter influencers to have their own tweet print shop, so they can earn money from their tweets without having to make any extra effort beyond their influencer activity. Our goal is also to offer Twitter users a convenient shopping experience, as they will be able to purchase your tweet prints from your timeline without having to close Twitter. 

so thanks to this extension you can transform your timeline into a virtual shop where each of your tweets can be printed onto t-shirts or mugs (more items to come)
